comments.body: nit: We're not really testing the constructor here. A better name might be something like `testAllPartitionsNotSupportedForOlderVersions`. If we modify this code to use `assertThrows`, then we can test both versions 0 and 1.
For my own education: why do we set `false` here?
Just for the purpose of having more case coverage, the default builder is used in other unit tests and we already have a unit test which sets the flag to true.
